titleStmt.title: An earnest and compassionate suit for forbearance to the late learned writers of some controversies at present / by a melancholly stander-by.
titleStmt.author: Wettenhall, Edward, 1636-1713.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Bristol Public library, Bristol, England.
Attributed to Edward Wettenhall. cf. NUC pre-1956.
